articles.description: Europeans get great pre-order perks and that looks to continue with the Pixel Watch possibly getting bundled with the Pixel 7 Pro...
articles.content:
Europes trend of having fantastic Google pre-order perks continues with the Pixel 7 Pro coming with a free Pixel Watch.
